meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>meet</kanji> for <kanji>cooperation</kanji>, you're coming together to help each other. One form of this is when people form <vocabulary>association</vocabulary>s. They're all cooperating and coming together to help each other and themselves.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
